description: Total number of distinct palindromes of form 'n-digit number' x 'n-digit number_reversed' (n-digit number not palindromic).
links: P. De Geest, Palindromic Products of Non Palindromic Integers and their Reversals
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Feb 15 1999
